element.panel_attributes: /User/ -- -firstName : String -lastName : String -phone : String -email : String -- +getFirstName() : String {query} +setFirstName(firstName : String) +getLastName() : String {query} +setLastName(lastName : String) +getPhone() : String {query} +setPhone(phone : String) +getEmail() : String {query} +setEmail(email : String) +getAddresses() : List<Address> {query} +removeAddress(address : Address) +addAddress(address : Address)

Customer -- +getRequests() : List<Request> +getApprovedRequests() : List<Request> +getPendingRequests() : List<Request> +getEvaluations() : List<Evaluation> +createRequest(Date date, Time time, Technician technician, OfferedService offeredService) +pay(Request request, double givenAmmount) +browseTechnician() : Technician +evaluate(Technician tech, Visit visit) : Evaluation

Tecnician -- +getServices() : List <TechnicianService> {query} +setServices(services : List <OfferedServices>) +getRequests() : List<Request> +getApprovedRequests() : List<Request> +getPendingRequests() : List<Request> +approve(Request request ) +setRequests(requests : List<Requests>) +browseResources() : List<Resource>
Payment -- -paymentCode : String _-counter : int_ -totalCost : double -- +getPaymentCode() : String {query} _+getCounter() : int {query}_ +getTotalCost() : double {query}

Address -- -street : String -number : int -postalCode : String -- +getStreet() : String {query} +setStreet(street : String) +getNumber() : int {query} +setNumber(number : int) +getPostalCode() : String {query} +setPostalCode(postalCode : String)

Resource -- -name : String -price : double -quantity : int -- +getName() : String {query} +setName(name : String) +getPrice() : double {query} +setPrice(price : double) +getQuantity() : int {query} +setQuantity(quantity : int)

OfferedService -- -tecnician : Tecnician -service : Service -cost : double -- +getTecnician() : Tecnisian{query} +setTecnician(tecnician : Tecnician) +getService() : Service {query} +setService(service : Service) +getCost() : double {query} +setCost(cost : double)
